BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO ACTCAS_AL_CHAL_ONLINE_TRN(GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,NUM_DEPARTMENT_CODE,STR_BILL_NUMBER,DT_BILL_DATE,STR_TYPE_OF_BILL,STR_CHALLAN_NO,DT_CHALLAN_DATE,STR_TYPE_OF_DEPOSITOR,STR_EMPLOYEE_CODE,STR_AGN_CODE,NUM_DEPT_CODE,STR_HOD_CODE,STR_DEPOSIT_TYPE,NUM_AMOUNT_TO_BE_DEPOSIT,STR_PARTICULAR_OF_DEPOSIT,STR_PREPARATION_REMAKRS,STR_PREPARED_BY,STR_CHALLAN_STATUS,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,STR_MODIFY_SL_NO) ( SELECT T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,T.NUM_DEPARTMENT_CODE,T.STR_BILL_NUMBER,T.DT_BILL_DATE,T.STR_TYPE_OF_BILL,T.STR_CHALLAN_NO,T.DT_CHALLAN_DATE,T.STR_TYPE_OF_DEPOSITOR,T.STR_EMPLOYEE_CODE,T.STR_AGN_CODE,T.NUM_DEPT_CODE,T.STR_HOD_CODE,T.STR_DEPOSIT_TYPE,T.NUM_AMOUNT_TO_BE_DEPOSIT,T.STR_PARTICULAR_OF_DEPOSIT,T.STR_PREPARATION_REMAKRS,T.STR_PREPARED_BY,T.STR_CHALLAN_STATUS,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,T.GDT_EFFECT_DATE,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE,T.GNUM_ISVALID,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID,(select nvl(max(A.STR_MODIFY_SL_NO),0)+1 from ACTCAS_AL_CHAL_ONLINE_TRN A where A.STR_CHALLAN_NO=T.STR_CHALLAN_NO and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) FROM ACTCAS_CHAL_ONLINE_TRN T WHERE T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?)

INSERT INTO ACTCAS_AL_CHAL_ONLINE_DTL(STR_CHALLAN_NO,DT_CHALLAN_DATE,STR_INSTRUMENT_TYPE,STR_INSTRUMENT_NO,DT_INSTRUMENT_DATE,NUM_INSTRUMENT_AMOUNT,STR_BANK_CODE,DT_RECEIPT_DATE,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,NUM_INSTRUMENT_SL_NO,STR_MODIFY_SL_NO) (SELECT T.STR_CHALLAN_NO,T.DT_CHALLAN_DATE,T.STR_INSTRUMENT_TYPE,T.STR_INSTRUMENT_NO,T.DT_INSTRUMENT_DATE,T.NUM_INSTRUMENT_AMOUNT,T.STR_BANK_CODE,T.DT_RECEIPT_DATE,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,T.GDT_EFFECT_DATE,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE, T.GNUM_ISVALID,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID,T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,T.NUM_INSTRUMENT_SL_NO, (select nvl(max(A.STR_MODIFY_SL_NO),0)+1 from ACTCAS_AL_CHAL_ONLINE_DTL A where A.STR_CHALLAN_NO=T.STR_CHALLAN_NO and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) FROM ACTCAS_CHAL_ONLINE_DTL T WHERE T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?)
DELETE FROM ACTCAS_CHAL_ONLINE_DTL B WHERE B.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? and B.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE ACTCAS_CHAL_ONLINE_TRN T SET T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?,T.NUM_DEPARTMENT_CODE=?,T.STR_BILL_NUMBER=?,T.DT_BILL_DATE=?,T.STR_TYPE_OF_BILL=?,T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=?,T.DT_CHALLAN_DATE=?,T.STR_TYPE_OF_DEPOSITOR=?,T.NUM_DEPT_CODE=?,T.STR_HOD_CODE=?,T.STR_DEPOSIT_TYPE=?,T.NUM_AMOUNT_TO_BE_DEPOSIT=?,T.STR_PARTICULAR_OF_DEPOSIT=?,T.STR_PREPARATION_REMAKRS=?,T.STR_PREPARED_BY=?,T.STR_CHALLAN_STATUS=?,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,T.GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,T.GNUM_ISVALID=?,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID=? WHERE T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
update PISWOT_BILL_GEN_TRN T set T.STR_BILL_ACCEPT_FLAG=1 where T.STR_BILL_NUMBER=? and T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
update PISCGH_BL_GEN_TRN T set T.STR_BILL_ACCEPT_FLAG=1 where T.STR_BILL_NUMBER=? and T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
update PISWSP_BILL_GEN_TRN T set T.STR_BILL_ACCEPT_FLAG=1 where T.STR_BILL_NUMBER=? and T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
update piswwh_bl_gen_trn T set T.STR_BILL_ACCEPT_FLAG=1 where T.STR_BILL_NUMBER=? and T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
